welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Isabela, Puerto Rico! Known for its stunning beaches and vibrant culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and experience all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all the wonders of Isabela!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Borinquen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Borinquen Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BQN Free WiFi' on their device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eugenio M De Hostos Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Eugenio M De Hostos Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arecibo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arecibo Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
